dialogue.content: My prosthetic leg is chafing my skin where the socket meets my thigh.
Chafing can lead to sores. Is the socket feeling loose lately?
A little. I've lost some weight, so it might be sliding around more.
You might need to add a prosthetic sock or get a socket adjustment. Are you okay using an app to log the sore spots?
I'm quite tech-savvy, I already use a fitness tracker to count my steps.
That's perfect. Logging the skin irritation alongside your step count will help the prosthetist.
I'll start logging my skin chafing and my daily steps to show my prosthetist.
